title: The Nevermets
overview: Thanks to online dating apps, the rise of digital communication and of course the lockdown, international long-distance relationships are more common than ever. But what happens when you fall in love with someone who lives on the other side of the planet that you've never actually met?The Nevermets will explore this extraordinary phenomenon. The series will follow Brits who have all fallen madly in love online as they each make the potentially life changing decision to cross international waters to meet their long-distance lovers for the very first time.
